about_the_game:
Aria will find herself in one of the many worlds in the multiverse. She must be ever vigilant as her soul has been accidently marked as Unbound. She has been told that this means any of the Gods and Goddesses can claim her soul and put it where ever they please if she were to meet her end. Navigate through new lives while avoiding the occasional freak accident that will cause her untimely end. Yes Accident Prone is another trait that her soul was apparently born with.



The ever changing dungeons offer Aria a challenge but also grants her great treasures and riches. The floors get progressively more difficult as she goes higher up. The traps also become far more deadly so she must avoid triggering them. The treasures and riches are the reason she keeps going...the higher she goes the better treasures and more gold she finds. She was told that if she went high enough she could even get an audience with the God or Goddess that presides over that world.



The Demon Lord...the name says all Aria needs to know. At first she despised the Demon Lord but as she progressed through her trials she came to realize that the Demon Lord is actually trying to help her in her own evil way. She always reincarnates Aria into a monster or an object. Aria must figure out what the Demon Lord wants her to do as these things and perform those tasks in order to be released from these forms.

Game Features:

Roguelike Dungeons - Loot, layout, traps and monsters all change every time a dungeon is changed.

Roguelike Player Death - Death brings you to a new world and a new incarnation each time. The player can obtain items that will allow them to reincarnate to specific worlds and forms at the next reincarnation. These items are found only in Dungeons.

RPG Elements - Quests, Inventory Management, Loot, NPCs and other standard RPG content.

Survival Mode - can enable survival mode to add an extra layer of challenge. Manage food, water and temperature effects as you go through normal gameplay. This setting is off by default but can be turned on in the Gameplay Settings.

Crafting and Building - many items can be crafted from loot obtained in Dungeons. The best items in the game are crafted and fused with items in Dungeons. Build in designated areas of both Dungeons and the world areas.

  • Memory: 8 GB RAM

short_description: Accidently loosing her life, Aria finds her self in the spirit realm...her new life simple and relaxing is torn apart once more as she is thrust into another world. Will she have any OP skills in this new world? She must find her way back but finds that each time she fails another world awaits.
